attributes.action: Use child abuse laws against adults who smoke near children.  This should include pregnant women who smoke.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now known that passive smoking causes lifelong harm.
Yet it is still seen as 'acceptable' for adults to smoke around children.
Causing a child lifelong harm is surely child abuse ?
There are child abuse laws already available.   They must be used with zero tolerance against adults who smoke around children.
This must include the worst of all abuse - pregnant women who smoke.
